Overcome 2 successes; @Check[arcana|dc:34] or @Check[thievery|dc:34]

The PCs suppress or disable dangerous traps set to kill would-be thieves and make an explosive ruckus.

Special If a PC fails a check to overcome this scene, they trigger a trap that deals @Damage[16d6[untyped]] damage to that PC (@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]). If the PC critically fails, it deals this damage to all PCs in the scene.
